alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dallas; Hickory; Morgan; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:39PM CDT until July 30 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hickory County in central Missouri... Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Camden County in central Missouri... Southern Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 939 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Warsaw, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Lake of The Ozarks, Pomme de Terre Lake, Stockton Lake, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, Pomme De Terre State Park, Ha Ha Tonka State Park, Bennett Spring State Park, Osage Beach, Camdenton, Buffalo, Versailles, Village of Four Seasons, Lake Ozark, Pittsburg, Stover, Humansville, Laurie, Conway and Polk. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 110 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across Kansas City. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
